Reviews.Title: Looks good but....disappoints
Reviews.Author: L. Chandler
Reviews.Content: Amazon delivery was on time as expected. The watch kept loosing connection with my HTC One even when no  more than 4ft from the phone. Then on the 3rd day of use, it would simply turn itself off while the battery indicator shows full charge. I'm returning this but would consider getting another when they have worked out all the issues.

ProductInfo.Name: Etree BW10 Bluetooth Bracelet with Vibration Function and Digital Time Display Black
